titles.title: Federal Employee Locality Accountability in Retirement Act
Federal Employee Locality Accountability in Retirement Act
A bill to exclude locality adjustments from average pay for purposes of computing the amount of retirement annuities of new employees.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.
